message: Let's split it 75-25. I think it's fair considering the decreasing value of money.
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I think we can do better than 20% for you.
Considering the inflation, I propose a split of 49-51. This keeps our shares close to the original values adjusted for the diminishing worth of money.
I'll compromise on the split, but I think 40% is a bit low considering the original values.
